summary: This mod adds more uses for Stalhrim by adding the ability to add pieces to armor to upgrading the armor itself and giving it a seriously nice color.
descriptionHtml:
==================
     ICE ARMOR
Created by: tx3000
==================

====================================================================================================================================

REQUIREMENTS
------------------

Requires Dragonborn

====================================================================================================================================

FILES
------

Stalhrim Armor Upgrade.bsa
Stalhrim Armor Upgrade.esp

====================================================================================================================================

INSTALLATION
-----------------

Place both of these files into the Data folder of your Skyrim directory

Ice Armor.bsa
Ace Armor.esp

IMPORTANT:
PLEASE READ THE WARNING BELOW

====================================================================================================================================

WHAT THIS MOD DOES
----------------------------

This mod allows you to take Stalhrim and combine it with armor to craft an ice version of that armor.

Stalhrim is enchanted ice. When Stalhrim gets combined with a piece of base armor, that piece of armor becomes ice blue and gets 5 added to both it\'s armor rating and weight, and also has the name ice added to it\'s name.

NOTE: Armor Rating and Weight vary with a characters Stats.

====================================================================================================================================

HOW TO CRAFT ICE ARMOR
--------------------------------------

Take a piece of armor and Stalhrim to a forge, and combine both.
See the pictures in the description

You must complete the quest \"A New Source of Stalhrim\" in orded to be able to craft any ice armor. You will also need to have your smithing at the right level to create specific armors.

For example:
If you want to be able to create an ice version of any piece of Daedric armor you will need to have the Daedric Smithing perk and have finished the quest \"A New Source of Stalhrim\"

These are the armor sets and the pieces from each set can be upgraded.

Blades - Bonemold - Chitin Heavy - Chitin Light - Daedric - Dragonbone - Dragonscale
Draugr (Ancient Nordic) - Dwarven - Ebony - Elven - Falmer - Forsworn - Glass - Hide - Imperial
Iron - Nordic Carved - Orcish - Steel - Stormcloak - Studded

Clothing cannot be upgraded

After upgrading armor pieces to the ice version of it, you can smith and enchant it as normal.
NOTE: Some items cannot be made and have to be obtained off of an NPC\'s body after they\'re dead. Such as Falmer, Forsworn, and Blades armor sets. Also not every armor set has a shield, some armor sets only have Helmet, Cuirass, Gauntlets and Boots...You get the idea

====================================================================================================================================

WARNING
-----------

Smithing any base armor at a forge that is enchanted, will result in you losing all enchantments on that piece. However you can re-enchant that piece again.

====================================================================================================================================
